articles.title: 'I feel euphoric!' Sir Ian McKellen, 81, safely receives COVID-19 vaccine - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sir Ian McKellen CBE, 81, has safely received the Covid-19 vaccine after the NHS launched its vaccine rollout earlier this month.
articles.content:
